Installation

Git UPM

Installing the UDiscord package requires the following steps:

  1. Make sure Git is installed.
  2. Open Package Manager.
  3. Click the + button and click the Add package from git URL.
  4. Enter https://github.com/NK-Studio/UDiscord-Bot.git?path=Assets/Plugins/UDiscordBot and click the Add button.

UnityPackage

Download and install the latest version of the package from GitHub Releases.
